customImageName.deprecatedMessage: In releases prior to June 12, 2017, this parameter was ignored by the API. It is now deprecated.

attachmentState.deprecatedMessage: In releases prior to November 14, 2017, this parameter returned attached for system disks in the API response. It is now deprecated, but still included in the response. Use isAttached instead.

gbInUse.deprecatedMessage: In releases prior to November 14, 2017, this parameter was not included in the API response. It is now deprecated.

options.deprecatedMessage: In releases prior to November 29, 2017, this parameter was not included in the API response. It is now deprecated.

nextPageCount.deprecatedMessage: In releases prior to June 12, 2017, this parameter returned null by the API. It is now deprecated, and the API returns the nextPageToken parameter instead.
